amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in the Congressional Record to provide $7.8 million of the funds provided for diplomatic and consular programs in the State Department for legal representation for parents who are seeking the return of children abducted to or from the United States.

action.text: Mr. Wolf raised a point of order against the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A014). The amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
